channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Banks hit by global Microsoft outage - see full list as payments affected
item.description: Global outages at Microsoft have left people unable to access the bank accounts, or pay by card at their local shops

item.title: 14 children end up in hospital after trying ‘adult only’ crisps
item.description: The 'R18' crisps are made using an extract from the ultra-spicy ghost pepper.

item.title: Morrisons, Asda and Iceland issue Microsoft outage statements - full list of supermarkets affected
item.description: An ongoing global IT issue has grounded planes, left people unable to access online banking and wreaked havoc on computers. Here's the latest on what's happening in UK supermarkets

item.title: Woman describes out of body aura she felt in near-death experience after crash
item.description: 'The experience has allowed me to see the beauty of life.'

item.title: What is CrowdStrike? Who owns the faulty IT system behind 'worst ever' global outage
item.description: The cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike confirmed a faulty update in its Microsoft software was the cause of a massive outage that brought chaos to airports, hospitals, banks, and supermarkets

item.title: Sheep start behaving strangely after eating 100kg of cannabis in greenhouse
item.description: The herd munched an entire crop of weed.

item.title: Stunning 'Lake Como dupe' is hugely popular destination on Airbnb as travellers swoon
item.description: Which is better comes down to the preference of the traveller with Lake Como boasting more historical attractions and Lake Maggiore well-known for its botanical gardens

item.title: Blind mystic Baba Vanga made a chilling prediction for 2025
item.description: 28 years after her death, Baba Vanga's predictions seem to be coming to fruition.

item.title: Leeds riots: Sobbing dad begs for his children back after night of violence on streets
item.description: It is believed violence flared after four children were removed and placed into care. The parents involved approached the Mirror and begged for the youngsters to be returned

item.title: Man tries to smuggle 100 snakes in his trousers and it goes as you’d expect
item.description: He was trying to walk through the 'nothing to declare' gate when he was stopped.
